title: Why You Should Incorporate Self-Learning Into Your Life
summary: When you’re self-learning, you have more control over what you learn and when you learn it. Self-learning is the most effective form of learning, as it allows you to be more flexible with your studies. It also helps you avoid wasting time on courses or topics that don’t interest you. There are a few ways you can incorporate self-learning into your life, such as reading books, watching lectures and Ted Talks. Join an online course or seminar, or learn a new skill or a new language.
